info.description: This is the API documentation of ECard Adaptor application.
info.title: ECard Adaptor

post.description: Login a player through the API by username (ecard operation 'authentication/login')

get.summary: Get the details from external player

parameters.name: sessionToken
parameters.description: The authorization of the user that was provided upon authentication

parameters.name: sessionToken
parameters.description: The authorization of the user that was provided upon authentication

parameters.name: sessionToken
parameters.description: The authorization of the user that was provided upon authentication

parameters.name: uid
parameters.description: The bet id as path parameter

token_type.description: the type of the generated token

refresh_token.description: the token used to refresh login of the user

expires_in.description: the time in seconds of the duration of the token

scope.description: the scope of the generated token

data.description: The error data which is an abstract object that may be used to provide any error metadata

source.description: The application at which the API error occured

type.description: The error family, e.g. RUNTIME, VALIDATION, etc

guid.description: The unique identifier of the error process

FaultInfo.description: The FaultInfo object contains all the details assosiated with an API error

clientID.description: The client id of the user

clientStatID.description: The client stat id of the user

PlayerProfileExternalDTO.description: The external profile of a player

clientSegmentID.description: The segment id of the client

defaulted.description: Check if the client segment is default

playerSelectedSegment.description: Check if the segment of the player is selected

withdrawalIntervalMinutes.description: The minutes of the interval withdrawal

ClientSegmentData.description: The data of a client segment

countryPrefix.description: The country prefix (not used in ECard)

mobilePrefix.description: The mobile prefix (not used in ECard)

phoneNumberType.description: The type of the phone number (not used in ECard)

clientID.description: The client id of the user

clientStatID.description: The client stat id of the user

emailAddress.description: The email address of the user

firstName.description: The first name of the user

lastName.description: The last name of the user

acceptedLatestTerms.description: Check if the latest accepted terms has been accepted

address1.description: The first address of the player

address2.description: The second address of the player

countryStateName.description: The name of the country state

emailVerificationTypeID.description: The type id for email Verification

accountClosed.description: Check if the account is closed

actived.description: Check if the account is active

kycChecked.description: Check if the KYC is checked

playAllowed.description: Check if it is allowed to play

suspicious.description: Check if the account is suspicious

kycCheckedStatus.description: The status of the KYC is checked

kycCheckedStatusCode.description: The code of the KYC checked status

newsFeedsAllow.description: Check if it is allowed the news feeds

phoneNumbers.description: List of phone numbers of a player

phoneVerificationTypeID.description: The id of the phone verification type

playerRegistrationState.description: The state of the player's registration

postVerificationTypeID.description: The id of post verification type

smsVerificationTypeID.description: The ID of the sms verification

secretQuestionID.description: The id of the secret question

thirdPartyVerificationTypeID.description: The id of the third party verification type

vipLevelID.description: The id of the vip's level

vipLevelName.description: The name of the vip's level

prefixName.description: The prefix name of the player

PlayerProfileFullDTO.description: The full version profile of a player

playerRestrictionType.description: The type of a restricted player

reason.description: The reason that a player has a restriction

restrictFromDate.description: The date that the restriction starts

restrictUntilDate.description: The date that the restriction ends

RestrictionPlayerData.description: The data for a player's restriction

transactionId.description: BetSlip transaction ID of the rollback operation

rollbackTransactionId.description: TransactionId of the bet, sent in betPlaced Intralot wants to rollback

ascOdds.description: This will be Odds that are Greater than the odds of the bet

descOdds.description: This will be Odds that are Less than the odds of the bet

stopLoss.description: This will be a value less than the stake of the bet

stopWin.description: This will be a Value that is Greater than the stake of the bet

accountBonusId.description: The total price of the bet

autoCashout.description: The total price of the bet

bonusCodeAwarded.description: The bonus code awarded. Server side generated

bonusWinnings.description: For bets in an ACCEPTED state, this will be the potential bonus winnings if the bet wins, for WINNING or SETTLED bets it will be the actual bonus winnings

cashOut.description: In case this bet can be cashed out

channelId.description: Channel ID that this bet part was played

checkOdds.description: Check type of the additional odds data. The system will reject a coupons when: 1. a selected forecast has lower current Odds or different current Handicap / UO value than these the player has seen 2. a selected forecast has different current Odds / Handicap / UO value than these the player has seen 3. a selected forecast has different Handicap / UO value than these the player has seen

childBetId.description: The child bet id. This should exist after an Edit or Patially cashout bet

limitedStake.description: When bet limit or stake limit validation fails, this contains the maximum stake the user can enter, in their currency

liveBet.description: In case this is live bet or not

originalCashoutBetId.description: If this bet is a child bet from partial cashout, this betId is its parent

parentBetId.description: The parent bet id. This should exist after an Edit or Patially cashout bet

partialCashoutBetIds.description: If this bet is a parent of partial cashout those betIds are their children

referralPath.description: Canvas might have this field as registration source

rejectionReason.description: The reason why a bet has been rejected

status.description: Status of the part bet, e.g. ACCEPTED, REJECTED, VOID

taxOnReturnsPcnt.description: Taxation percentage on returns amount (on winnings amount)

totalCost.description: Betâ€™s total cost that the player have pay

totalDiscountStake.description: The discounted bet stake. Server side generated

totalOdds.description: Total odds of the specific bet part

totalPrice.description: The total price of the bet

voucherCode.description: The bonus code awarded. Server side generated

winType.description: Win bet data type,WIN, PLACE, EACH_WAY

buildABet.description: Indicates that bet is created by bet builder.

decimal.description: Decimal odds of each selection. e.g. 2,60

pin.description: Players pin. Mandatory for Bit8 PAM

optIn.description: to optIn a list of promotion ids. The client selects which promotions will be evaluated (if they are optIn promotions)

outcomeId.description: the outcome that is returned from the engine to the caller. A reference for the given promotion

promotionId.description: the id of the promotion that generated the outcomeId

voucherCode.description: a string literal placeholder for a voucher code

getiMarket.description: The index market, -1:No i-market 0..19: i-market played position OR 0..127: Live Home Team Score when the forecast=724..729)

groupValue.description: Mandatory for Iflex. 0: No group, 1..10 : groups A, B, C, D, AB, AC, AD, BC, BD, CD, 11..20: R-groups A, B, C, D, AB, AC, AD, BC, BD, CD, +100 : Banker selection

lines.description: The Handicap/Under-Over value. Only IFlex will have 2 indexes: var0, var1

partNo.description: The number of the selection. If there are 3 selections they should have 1,2,3 respectively

scores.description: The match score. Indexed by team A score{0} & team B score {1}

selectionId.description: The selection id. For Iflex will be MARK_CODE_EVENT_CODE

status.description: The status of the selection, equivalent to the status of the BetPartPlacementResult

selectionNames.description: An object contain variations of names

resultType.description: Result description of selection result: e.g NOT_SET,WIN,LOST

acceptOdds.description: Accept odds types: 1 = Higher Odds, 2 = All, 3 = None, Only same odds

totalCount.description: In response only, The total number of bets

result.description: If present, contains the payment status of the betslip

amount.description: Betting amount on each combination will be produced from those parts

currency.description: Description of the currency with letters e.g. "GBP"

systems.description: The bet system multiplier. Only IFlex

type.description: Betting data type:SINGLE, MULTIPLE, DOUBLE, SYSTEM_3, SYSTEM_4, SYSTEM_5, SYSTEM_6, SYSTEM_7, SYSTEM_8, BANKER_2BANKER_3BANKER_4BANKER_5BANKER_6BANKER_7BANKER_8TRIXIECANADIAN, HEINZ, SUPER_HEINZ, PATENT, LUCKY_15, LUCKY_31, LUCKY_63, LUCKY_127YANKEE, GOLIATH, SUPER_GOLIATH, WINCAST, SCORECAST, ANYTIME_SCORECAST, TIMECAST, STRAIGHT_FORECAST, REVERSE_FORECAST, COMBINATION_FORECAST, TRICAST, COMBINATION_TRICAST

WagerDataModel.description: one of the dbg,instant,spbt,sportsbook should be used depending on the played game

isecure.description: unique number that is printed on each ticket (retailer specific)
